lead_paragraph: Lauren Elizabeth Campbell, the daughter of Nancy Irvine Campbell and Dr. Charles B. Campbell III of Winston-Salem, N.C., was married Friday to Michael Peter Gilbane, a son of Mary O'Donnell Gilbane and Thomas F. Gilbane Jr. of Newport, R.I. The Rev. Robert J. Randall, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at St. Mary Roman Catholic Church in Wilmington, N.C. On Saturday evening, the couple had another Roman Catholic service, also led by Father Randall, at the Figure Eight Island Yacht Club in Wilmington.
